title: 93x38: Time Required to Complete the SF 450 Form, Privacy Concerns, and Intra-Office Review of the SF 450 Form
summary: Employee’s may be permitted by their agency to use work hours to complete the SF 450, the information required on the form is targeted at identifying conflicts of interest, and supervisors may review employee SF 450 forms but such information is strictly protected by executive branch principles of confidentiality and the Federal Privacy Act.
